summary: This document contains details of incoming and outgoing wire transfers involving various financial institutions and individuals. It highlights transactions related to Deutsche Bank, Citibank, and Bank of America, among others, and includes references to specific beneficiaries and amounts transferred.

persons.name: Wayne Goldstein
persons.context: Wayne Goldstein is mentioned as a beneficiary in a financial transaction involving Bank of America.

persons.context: Gerard Rotonda is referenced multiple times as a beneficiary in transactions involving Deutsche Bank.

connections.description: Glenn Dubin and Eva Anderson-Dubin are mentioned together as beneficiaries in a financial transaction.
Gerard Rotonda and Wayne Goldstein are both mentioned in the context of financial transactions involving Bank of America.
Gerard Rotonda is mentioned in transactions that also involve Glenn Dubin as a beneficiary.

keyFacts: The document details multiple wire transfers involving significant amounts of money.
Deutsche Bank and Citibank are prominently featured as financial institutions involved in the transactions.
Wayne Goldstein, Gerard Rotonda, Glenn Dubin, Eva Anderson-Dubin, and Carol O. Marin are named beneficiaries in various transactions.
The document includes references to specific addresses in New York and the Cayman Islands.
There are indications of internal transfers and checks received as part of the financial activities.
